snippet: Coach Marc Mitchell, whose team begins defense of its national title this week, has made F.D.U.-Florham of Madison, N.J., a recognizable name in Division III women’s basketball.
abstract: Fairleigh Dickinson-Florham women's basketball team, led by coach Marc Mitchell, is busy preparing for opening-round NCAA Division III tournament game against Johnson & Wales; FDU-Florham is first team from New Jersey to win NCAA Division III women's basketball title.
lead_paragraph: Coach Marc Mitchell, whose team begins defense of its national title this week, has made F.D.U.-Florham of Madison, N.J., a recognizable name in Division III women’s basketball.

headline.main: F.D.U.-Florham, Division III Champion, Sets Its Sights on Repeating
headline.print_headline: After Fulfilling Coach’s Vow, a Champion Looks to Repeat
